overview: Arch Enemy are on their way to world domination - at the least when melodic death metal is concerned! "Will To Power", their second release with the incomparable Alissa White-Gluz and successor to "War Eternal", is set for release on September 8th and will surely kick some serious ass.  Of course, such a release has to be celebrated with live shows, Germany will be hit in January 2018. Wintersun, Tribulation and Jinjer will accompany Arch Enemy on their tour - a band package that is not to be missed!
title: Arch Enemy - Live At Wacken
